remarks: An exchange lemma for modular pairs.  Lemma 1.6 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 2. (Contributed by NM, 22-Jun-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
mdexch.1 $e |- A e. CH $.
mdexch.2 $e |- B e. CH $.
mdexch.3 $e |- C e. CH $.
mdexchi $p |- ( ( A MH B /\ C MH ( A vH B ) /\ ( C i^i ( A vH B ) ) C_ A ) -> ( ( C vH A ) MH B /\ ( ( C vH A ) i^i B ) = ( A i^i B ) ) ) $.
